thread.section_title: Hotel Del Corso - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommend
thread.title_full: Highly recommend - Review of Hotel Del Corso, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ivanab184
title: Highly recommend
text: Me and my friend were very surprised about this hotel, I think it's not possible to find better in Roma ! Breakfast very tasty and good, rooms very nice, reception service very fast and effective. Everything is near from the hotel we've never had to take public transport or taxi just to go at the airport which is normal. I will come back with great pleasure and will recommend ! If you don't know were to sleep in Roma do not hesitate anymore :) I'm working in a hotel in Paris and have nothing to say at all !
